text: I yesli obe vy k Allakhu v raskayanii obratites' - A ved' uzhe sklonilis' k etomu vashi serdtsa, - (On vam, poistine, prostit). No yesli vy, potvorstvuya drug drugu, Protiv (proroka Moyego) poydete, To, istinno, Allakh - yego zashchitnik, I Dzhibrail, i kazhdyy spravedlivyy iz prinyavshikh veru, I dazhe angely potom pridut yemu na pomoshch'
